snippet: Senator Tom Coburn is right to demand greater vigilance from Congress on the state of the program and its costs.
abstract: Editorial holds report by Sen Tom Coburn is right to point out examples of wasteful grants issued by the Department of Homeland Security, but notes majority of such spending has indeed improved emergency preparedness; calls for better Congressional oversight of homeland security and its costs.
lead_paragraph: Senator Tom Coburn is right to demand greater vigilance from Congress on the state of the program and its costs.
